mean_en: annoyed or irritated by somebody/something, especially because you have to wait for a long time
word_etyma: im不 + patient有耐心的 → impatient 不耐烦的
short_phrase: be impatient and want to get off the phone
sentence: My girlfriend was an hour late for our date. I was getting impatient.
sentence_trans: 我女朋友已经约会迟到一个小时了，我开始不耐烦了。
